channel.title: Euthymia release
channel.description:
This is euthymia release, note: this is not containing the custom quests as i switched bases lol. its just the deltascape server we all knew all the feature, ugly pc, jad and their quests all that stuff. I just handled it on its own class and stuff like that.. packaged and did some things. like cleaning, apart from cleaning i did some other things. -Added 634 stuff, not gameframe, and not maps, just the items and the characters.. that stuff.. -Added clipping. -Added better firemaking. -Added kinda quickchat. -Added control panel. -...There may be other things that i dont remember? - oh added draynor manor ghosts when night. -Added day night system.. -Added run in the quest tab.. -Uhm... I remember you. It's deltascape content. i just added a few things and cleaned. [code]space for development log i will search for it ..[/code] I will add some pictures tomorrow, im just lazy to do it right now so i took two vids.
[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iGxsWNN8In8&feature=youtu.be[/youtube] [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ngZ_WHkwbf4&feature=youtu.be[/youtube] and finally the download link. [url=https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/36720484/Euthymia.rar]Server[/url] [url=https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/36720484/Euthymialocale.jar]Client[/url]

item.title: Euthymia release
item.dc:creator: @strucker Strucker
item.description:
@strucker wrote:

[quote=“enzo42, post:5, topic:523925”]Did you really have to choose the 2 most terrible songs on your videos?

Good Job

EDIT: Whats up with the weird packaging and the weird packing names[/quote]OH LOL it’s just that i was teaching a friend a little about rsps and we speak spanish so some of the package was in spanish so he could find out easier the stuff :P. and sorry for the songs i just didn’t know what to put.

@Arham just make a global boolean declaring if its day or not and make a task that changes it at the time you want
and… then update the players from that boolean using this two methods.

[code] if (c.DayNightSystem.isNight == true) {
c.setInterfaceWalkable(12418);

		} else if (c.DayNightSystem.isDay == true) {
			c.setInterfaceWalkable(65535);

		}[/code]

the way i did it was a little shitty but its kinda how i done it.

EDIT: if anyone is wondering i didn’t separate packets from client because you know delta had a shitload of things in there and this was supposed to keep deltascape content so i didn’t put it on its own file because im too lazy to break my fingers doing that.

Read full topic

item.title: Euthymia release
item.dc:creator: @strucker Strucker
item.description:
@strucker wrote:

This is euthymia release, note: this is not containing the custom quests as i switched bases lol.
its just the deltascape server we all knew all the feature, ugly pc, jad and their quests all that stuff.
I just handled it on its own class and stuff like that… packaged and did some things. like cleaning, apart from cleaning i did some other things.
-Added 634 stuff, not gameframe, and not maps, just the items and the characters… that stuff…
-Added clipping.
-Added better firemaking.
-Added kinda quickchat.
-Added control panel.
-…There may be other things that i dont remember?

  • oh added draynor manor ghosts when night.
    -Added day night system…
    -Added run in the quest tab…
    -Uhm…
    I remember you.
    It’s deltascape content. i just added a few things and cleaned.

I will add some pictures tomorrow, im just lazy to do it right now so i took two vids.
